title: deCODE - 1Password
content: Chosen out of 1000+ participants to attend deCODE hackathon, partnered with 1Password mentors to create a web application that integrates their upcoming 1Password feature.

title: Scarborough Dining 1st Place
content: Winning team chosen by the City of Toronto and the BRIDGE UTSC, creating a food ordering app with a focus on Scarborough restaurant owners to connect and have an online presence.

title: RBC Innovation 3rd Place
content: One of the best overall project for RBC's Innovation Challenge, creating an app to aid international students streamline their banking process in Canada.
